name: dflow
description: is a minimal Dataflow programming engine

scripts._build: npm test && npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run jekyll; git status
scripts._push: git push origin master && npm run gh-pages:push
scripts._pull: git pull origin master && npm run gh-pages:pull
scripts.browserify: npm run browserify:client; npm run browserify:dist; npm run browserify:examples; npm run browserify:test
scripts.browserify:client: npm run browserify:client:edit; npm run browserify:client:run
scripts.coverage: npm run istanbul && npm run coveralls
scripts.cp: npm run cp:dist; npm run cp:package.json; npm run cp:style.css
scripts.gh-pages:push: git subtree --prefix gh-pages push origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-pages:pull: git subtree --prefix gh-pages pull origin gh-pages
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
---" > gh-pages/index.md; cat README.md >> gh-pages/index.md
scripts.jekyll: npm run homepage; npm run cp; cd gh-pages; jekyll build; cd ..
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish
scripts.#TODO standard: npm run standard:bin; npm run standard:editor; npm run standard:engine; npm run standard:test
scripts.standard: for x in bin editor engine; do npm run standard:$x; done
scripts.standard:editor: cd src/editor/; standard server.js client/*js; cd ..
scripts.standard:test: cd test; standard --global describe --global it; cd ..
scripts.test: npm run standard; npm run mocha
scripts.wget:img.shields.io: for x in forks stars watchers; do npm run wget:img.shields.io:$x; done
